name: Propaganda
description:
How to Play
  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move and put up posters, and E to interact with everything
  • Keep your propaganda bar high by giving people food and water and putting up posters
  • The more propaganda you have, the bigger the head of the people around you, when their head turns blue, bring they in by pressing “E”. You need 30 heads.
  • Giving people food and water makes their head bigger
